Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri will be appearing in his 150th international match.
India last scored a goal in November 2023 against Kuwait.
India needs at least four points from their next three matches to remain in control of their fate.
Stimac hopes that Chhetri can make his landmark match all the more special with a performance befitting his stature in Indian football.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Tigers had last played in Guwahati five years ago, when they suffered a 1-2 defeat at the hands of Oman in the 2022 FIFA World Cup and 2023 AFC Asian Cup preliminary joint qualifiers.
